description: Updates the business glossary in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which a business glossary is to be updated.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the business glossary to be updated.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description to be updated as part of the UpdateGlossary action.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which a business glossary is to be updated.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the business glossary that is to be updated.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name to be updated as part of the UpdateGlossary action.

nested_items.name: owningProjectId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the project in which to update a business glossary.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status to be updated as part of the UpdateGlossary action.
